intro.narration: Welcome, everyone! Today we're going to explore how to enhance your HubSpot integration by adding custom field properties to your WPForms. Before we begin, make sure you have WPForms installed and activated on your site.
intro.subtitle: Learn to extend HubSpot fields in WPForms with custom properties.

steps.narration: First up, navigate to your WordPress dashboard and expand the Marketing menu, then select HubSpot. Once there, you'll see the settings page where you can customize fields.
steps.subtitle: Access the HubSpot settings in the WordPress dashboard.

steps.narration: Next, open the dropdown menu for the Custom Field Name. Then, select the desired HubSpot field, such as 'Clicked on a LinkedIn Ad'.
steps.subtitle: Select a custom HubSpot field in the dropdown menu.
